ai-patthana22.26:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.26:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of a regular meal.
ai-patthana22.26:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for being easy to admonish, for this reason.
ai-patthana22.26:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for being easy to admonish, for the sake of surmounting wrong view.
ai-patthana22.26:1.1_2: Not for the sake of not grasping, nor for the sake of resentment, or for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of defilement, and for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.26:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.26:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of suspending the teaching, not for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.26:2.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of grasping one who has no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.26:2.1_2: roots haven’t been done or for the sake of three roots, three things should be for the sake of the object, and for the sake of one root.
